caption: Unmanned Systems
description: The Unmanned Systems event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in the Unmanned Systems category.
name: unmanned_systems

dst_endpoint.description: The destination network endpoint of the Unmanned Aerial System (UAS), Counter Unmanned Aerial System (CUAS) platform, or other unmanned systems monitoring and/or sensing infrastructure.

src_endpoint.description: The source network endpoint of the Unmanned Aerial System (UAS), Counter Unmanned Aerial System (CUAS) platform, or other unmanned systems monitoring and/or sensing infrastructure.
